TestCaseMetaData.name: Update Add
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Some time after initial Laboratory Test Compendium is delivered electronically from the LIS to the EHR-S, the LIS send up to four eDOS update messages to the EHR-S to add an orderable test. The EHR-S will integrate these updates into its test directory.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Initial load of compendium data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: Data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support adding a single record in an existing test compendium.
